DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Effect Dietary Fat Type Amount Vitamin D3 Absorption
DOC.detailed_description: There evidence vitamin D favorable effect bone muscle . Many adult low blood level 25-hydroxyvitamin D ( 25OHD ) consequently , vitamin D supplement widely recommend . The effect meal absorption vitamin D poorly understood . This single blind study examine whether amount type fat meal vitamin D take influence absorption . Vitamin D dissolve fat dietary fat may affect absorption ; moreover type fat respect mono- poly-unsaturation may also influence absorption . This study increase understand best take vitamin D order achieve maximal absorption . Up 65 healthy old men woman 25OHDlevels insufficient range enrol order get 60 completers 1-day study . They randomize one three meal group : high MUFA/PUFA ( n=30 ) , low MUFA/PUFA ( n=15 ) , fat-free ( n=15 ) . Those high MUFA/PUFA group also randomize single dose either 1,600 50,800 IU vitamin D. All participant two group receive 50,800 IU dose . They consume three meal provide study day . In morning come Center blood draw , consume breakfast meal , take assign dose vitamin D ( part label non-radioactive tracer , deuterium enable direct assessment vitamin D absorption ) . They also complete questionnaire diet health DXA total body scan . They give box lunch eat noon . They return HNRCA blood draw 6:00 , 8:00 , 10:00 pm . They dinner HNRCA 6:00 pm blood draw . They finish study final blood draw . Participants receive high dose vitamin D , 50,800 IU , ask take 400 IU vitamin D 1000 mg per day supplemental calcium attend tan salon month complete study , order minimize risk symptom vitamin D. Blood draw include screen visit 20 cc , morning visit 15 cc , three even blood draw 15 , 15 , 15 cc , respectively , total 80 cc .
